sessions.title: Amazon EKS: Production-Grade Kubernetes
sessions.description: Deploy and manage production Kubernetes workloads on Amazon EKS. Explore cluster autoscaling, security best practices, observability, and cost optimization techniques.

sessions.title: AWS Lambda: Performance Optimization Techniques
sessions.description: Maximize Lambda function performance and minimize costs. Explore cold start reduction, memory optimization, concurrency management, and execution environment best practices.

sessions.title: AWS Step Functions: Orchestrating Serverless Workflows
sessions.description: Build complex serverless applications with AWS Step Functions. Learn workflow patterns, error handling, parallel execution, and integration with Lambda, ECS, and other AWS services.

sessions.title: Amazon EventBridge: Event-Driven Architectures at Scale
sessions.description: Design event-driven architectures with Amazon EventBridge. Explore event patterns, schema discovery, cross-account events, and integration with SaaS applications.

sessions.title: Amazon ECS: Container Orchestration Made Simple
sessions.description: Run containerized applications on Amazon ECS with Fargate. Learn task definitions, service auto scaling, load balancing, and blue/green deployments.

sessions.title: Container Observability: Metrics, Logs, and Traces
sessions.description: Implement comprehensive observability for containerized applications. Explore CloudWatch Container Insights, AWS X-Ray, Prometheus, and distributed tracing patterns.

sessions.title: Application Load Balancer: Advanced Routing Patterns
sessions.description: Master Application Load Balancer features for modern applications. Learn path-based routing, host-based routing, Lambda targets, and weighted target groups.
speakers: Steven Williams, Network Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: AWS PrivateLink: Secure Service Connectivity
sessions.description: Connect VPCs and services securely with AWS PrivateLink. Explore endpoint services, cross-account access, and private API Gateway integrations.

sessions.title: AWS CodePipeline: CI/CD Best Practices
sessions.description: Build automated deployment pipelines with AWS CodePipeline. Learn multi-stage deployments, approval gates, cross-region replication, and integration with third-party tools.

sessions.title: Amazon CloudWatch: Deep Dive on Observability
sessions.description: Master CloudWatch for application monitoring. Explore custom metrics, log insights, alarms, dashboards, and ServiceLens for distributed tracing.

sessions.title: Serverless Architectures for Video Processing
sessions.description: Build scalable video processing pipelines with serverless technologies. Learn Lambda media processing, S3 event triggers, MediaConvert integration, and cost optimization.
speakers: Kevin Martinez, Media Solutions Architect, AWS

sessions.title: Multi-Cluster Kubernetes Management at Scale
sessions.description: Manage multiple EKS clusters across regions and accounts. Explore GitOps with Flux/ArgoCD, cluster federation, service mesh, and centralized policy management.
speakers: David Kumar, Container Platform Lead, AWS
